show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: EMT- Electromagnetic Muscle Testing
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN, AHG, AHN-BC, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews Mark Mincolla, Ph.D. Mark Mincolla is a… natural health care practitioner who has transformed the lives of many thousands of people over the past 30 years.
Mark has ingeniously integrated ancient Chinese energy techniques with cutting edge nutritional science in what has become his innovative Electromagnetic Muscle Testing system (EMT).
  The main focus of his integrated east-west approach is what he calls Acutrition, as it zeros in on each individual’s unique nutritional needs.
Mark continues to practice his world renowned work and deliver his passionate healing message to the public through his practice at Santi Holistic Healing, books, television and radio shows,  seminars and  his website.
On todays show, Mark will discuss his newest book, WHOLE HEALTH: A Holistic Approach to Healing for the 21st Century. Contact: www.markmincolla.com
